(Not a chance)

::Magmatron/Jynx(Was Obsidian)/Cerberus

    The old and th=
e new Destrons returned to Past Earth from an extended stay on Cybertron. A=
 rift had been opened near the Destron wreakage. Magmatron flew through in =
his Drake form, then Jynx followed as a VTOL.
    Cerberus saw this and kne=
w what it ment for his plans. He was dead if he didn't play the loyal subje=
ct, but his pride wouldn't let him.
    Magmatron landed, Jynx stopped in t=
he air and transformed to robot mode, in that mode he is a vertiable Clone =
of TV Obsidian. Magmatron transformed to robot mode and saw Cerberus. "How =
did you ecaspe?!!"
    Cerberus looked at him with difference. "The Hell yo=
u put me into let me grow strong. Magmatron, your rule had been ursurped. B=
y me, I am now the leader of the Destrons, and your formor allies are dead.=
 (He's lying)"
    Magmatron grabbed him by the neck and lifted him up to h=
is face. "So, you rule a wreakage?"
    Then he realized what the wreakage =
was, his old ship. "Arrrrah. Who did this? And you will tell me, because yo=
u, and any Destrons you may have are under my command now. And belive me, I=
 will seek out the bodies of my other troops."
